text:
No worries, I'm afraid I've taken much longer to get back to you! But its a pleasure to meet you too :smiley:
I started off working as a freelancer for a few companies, none noteworthy but eventually I landed a remote animator job at Lunar Animation, and worked there for almost 2 years before Framestore contacted me about this job. It was a great experience all round, ended up learning tons and still am. Still have a long way to go!
How are you finding the course and everything? Do you have a final project/ animation?
Also if you need just general animation feedback, feel free to send it over. I really like using sync sketch - <https://syncsketch.com/>, but I'm happy to help in whatever way's best for you.

attachments.text: Review media collaboratively in the cloud - no setup, visual creative feedback, all real time with just a link.
attachments.fallback: Review media collaboratively in the cloud - no setup, visual creative feedback, all real time with just a link.
